events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures the event of a new item being added to the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Handles the removal of an item from the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Records changes to an existing item in the inventory.

events.name: InventoryChecked
events.description: Triggers an inventory check or audit.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of a new item being added to the inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Handles the removal of an item from the inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Records changes to an existing item in the inventory.

commands.name: CheckInventory
commands.description: Triggers an inventory check or audit.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with external systems to sync inventory data.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Links to supplier systems for order management.

integrationPoints.name: SalesIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with sales systems to reflect sold-out items.
